original_title: La curiosa vida de Piter Eustaquio Rengifo Uculmana
overview: The random life and tragic death of Piter Eustaquio Rengifo Uculmana, reconstructed as a puzzle that gathers the acts, loves, crimes and sins of a man without more merit than that of bearing a name whose acrostic composes the word PERU.
title: La curiosa vida de Piter Eustaquio Rengifo Uculmana
